title: Hobbing a spur gear. Part I. Setting of the change gears
creator_credit: F.E. Brooker and Emerson Yorke Studio
brief_description: Shows the factors governing the selection of the hob; how to select change-gear combinations for speed, feed, and index; how to identify the correct gears; how to mount the change gears; how to adjust for backlash; and how the change-gear strains are interrelated.
title_for_label: Hobbing a spur gear. Part I. Setting of the change gears
